title.rendered: Zipline Colorado—A Treetop Adventure for the Whole Family

content.rendered:
If you have never zoomed through the air on a zipline Colorado style with AVA as your guide, then you are missing out on one of the most exhilarating outdoor adventures you could ever experience. If you thought AVA only provided some of the greatest whitewater rafting trips in the country, let us tell you about ziplining Colorado with AVA as your host. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or a first-timer, AVA has the zip line tour for you.

Our ziplining guides are knowledgeable, fun and always make your safety their number one priority. Ziplining Colorado with AVA truly is a treetop adventure for the whole family. As long as the kids are ten years old and weigh a minimum of 75 pounds, they can enjoy the thrilling experience of riding a zipline through the Colorado wilderness. The beauty that surrounds the zip lines will take your breath away, and you’ll want to book your next visit as soon as your day with AVA’s zip line crew is done!

Zipline Courses at AVA

Book the whole family for the Granite Zipline course that takes you through the forest and over the Arkansas River where you can see the mountains around you and water below you as you zip through the aspen and pine trees that surround the 44-acre property. After a ten-minute hike, you’ll reach your zipline course destination and that’s when the thrills begin!

The whole family will also enjoy the Idaho Springs Zipline course which zooms over nine acres of AVA forest property allowing you to enjoy six zips of different lengths up to 30 mph. You know you’re coming to the finish line as you cross over Chicago Creek.

Package deals for whitewater rafting and ziplining are available and amazing summer discounts are going on now. Zipline Colorado with AVA by booking your trip now! These specials won’t last long, so contact AVA today by phone or email at info@coloradorafting.net.
